New Records: The Yankees gave up a season-high 21 hits in the game
Key Match Events: Aaron Boone called it 'one of those games' after the Yankees' loss
The big blow was a two-out, three-run double by Lars Nootbaar off Kahnle
The game fell apart for the Yankees in the seventh
Cortes gave up a pair of singles, including one by Walker that skipped by Anthony Volpe, due in part to the slick conditions
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Boone emphasized the importance of the games and said 'we’ve got to play our best'
Soto said 'This is the right time to get hot. We’re definitely trying.'
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said 'Tough day for us. We know how important these games are, certainly.'
Cortes said 'As bad as people think we’re playing and as bad as it might show we’re playing, we’re still in first place. It goes to show it’s there for us to take.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: A six-game road trip starts Monday at Texas
The Yankees have lost four of five as they try to hang onto their lead over Baltimore in the AL East
Others: The Yankees dropped a second straight series to a National League team that’s barely in playoff contention
